item.title: TEST
item.description: $\sqrt(4)$ z^2 $$\sum_{x=1}^5 y^z$$ \[\int_a^b f(x)\] $$\begin{matrix} {z = re^{i\phi}z^n = (re^{i\phi})^n = \=r^ne^{in\phi} =\ r^n(cosn\phi + i sin n\phi)}\end{matrix}$$ \f\relax{x} = \int_{-\infty}^\infty \f\hat\xi,e^{2 \pi i \xi x} ,d\xi \f\relax{x} = \int_{-\infty}^\infty \f\hat\xi,e^{2 \pi i \xi x} ,d\xi
